Title: Relates to the determination of youthful offender status
Summary: Provides that an individual who was an eligible youth who was not determined to be a youthful offender by the sentencing court may apply to such court for a new determination after at least five years have passed since the imposition of the sentence, or at least five years after the individual's latest release from incarceration, if such individual was sentenced to a period of incarceration.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the criminal procedure law, in relation to the determination of youthful offender status
